about_the_game:
Snack Them All is a local multiplayer game designed for fun-filled, chaotic sessions with friends! Control a tiny snake, grow by eating food, and avoid deadly collisions with other snakes. The last player standing wins, but beware: game-changing power-ups can turn the tide in an instant.

Up to 8 players can battle on the same screen, thanks to a setup that allows two players to share one gamepad. Transform your living room into a competitive arena with exciting duels, team battles, or free-for-all mayhem.

Featuring vibrant and colorful visuals (HDR-supported for compatible screens), a dynamic electronic soundtrack, and fast-paced yet strategic matches, Snack Them All is the perfect experience for a night of friendly competition.

Key Features:

  • Local multiplayer action: Play with 2 to 8 players on the same screen.

  • Innovative controls: Two players can share a single gamepad.

  • Exciting power-ups: Bombs, food vacuum, speed boosts, and camera control keep matches unpredictable.

  • Point and medal system: Compete across multiple rounds to crown the ultimate champion.

  • Stunning visuals: Bright, colorful graphics with HDR support for enhanced display.

  • Energetic soundtrack: Rhythmic electronic music to amp up the excitement.

Grab your controllers, gather your friends, and find out who will be the ultimate champion in Snack Them All!

name: Snack Them All

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD FX series
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU compatible with DirectX 11 and at least 512 MB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GT 710, AMD Radeon HD 6450, or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Need at least 1 gamepad.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A vibrant and fun local multiplayer game for 2 to 8 players, where snakes grow by eating food and battle using game-changing power-ups. With two-player-per-gamepad controls and fast-paced action, it's the ultimate party game for friends!
